description: Analyze stocks with quick summaries, analyst targets, recommendations, and sector insights. Track SEC filings, insider transactions, dividends, splits, and institutional holders. Access financial statements and summarize filings to surface key points.

capabilities.name: get_stock_summary
capabilities.description: Get a basic stock summary using Yahoo Finance.

capabilities.name: get_sec_filings
capabilities.description: Get recent SEC filings for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_analyst_targets
capabilities.description: Get analyst price targets for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_recommendations
capabilities.description: Get analyst recommendations for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_dividends
capabilities.description: Get dividend history for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_splits
capabilities.description: Get stock split history for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_institutional_holders
capabilities.description: Get institutional holders for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_insider_transactions
capabilities.description: Get insider transactions for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_sector_info
capabilities.description: Get sector and industry information for a ticker.

capabilities.name: get_financial_statements
capabilities.description: Get balance sheet, income statement, and cashflow for a ticker.

capabilities.name: summarize_filing
capabilities.description: Fetches an SEC filing from a URL, extracts main content using BSHTMLLoader, and summarizes the key points.
